name: Bush Baby's Bushel o'Beets
description:
Press SPACEBAR to help the bush baby fill a bushel of beets by beating around the bush

This game is unfinished (primary action has not been implemented), but you can cheat the game by pressing B for BEETS!

UPDATE: oops webgl camera depth being funky; use the Windows builds for graphics as  intended!

Thank you @Nexidis for the 3D models!

Thank you @CurdleGames for hosting!

Thank you for playing!
